attributes.description:
MOTUS NISSAN & RENAULT MENLYN offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.

MOTUS MENLYN, where customers become friends

attributes.description:
This beastly TOYOTA LAND CRUISER 300 V6 3.3D GR-S is up for grabs! with FULL VPS MATTE BLACK BODY WRAP! (ORIGINAL COLOR MAROON) loaded with epic features such as -

• GR push button start 

• GR branded seats

• two tone leather interior 

• electric tailgate 

• 7 seater

• blind spot monitor 

• LED headlights 

• auto dimming mirrors

• 4 zone climate control 

• heated/cooled front and rear seats 

• usb charging ports 

• electric memory seats 

• lumbar support seats 

• heated steering wheel 

• keyless start/stop

• multi function steering wheel 

• pre crash safety alert 

• adaptive cruise control 

• Tyre pressure monitor 

• navigation 

• touch screen media interface 

• Bluetooth 

• 360 cameras 

• pedestrian alert

• JBL sound system

• auto high beam assist 

• auto hold handbrake

• driving modes select

• wireless charging pad 

• Centre cooler box 

• lane keeping assist 

• foglights

• wooden interior trim design

• towbar

• full VPS matte black body wrap

attributes.description: All our cars come standard with a 6 year 150 000km Warranty. Contact us for further information or to book a test drive. Nash Nissan is committed to bringing you quality New, PreOwned and Demo vehicles. Our vehicles are quality checked and undergo the roadworthiness test prior to delivery of the vehicle. All tradeins are welcome, we pay fair market related prices. Finance is available through all major finance providers and our team will tailor the deal to suit your needs. Nash Nissan is a division of Super Group whereby we are committed to earning your trust and building relationships.
